name: Team Leader
description: I served as Project Manager and Team Leader for SignAI, a Chilean Sign Language (LCHs) interpreter service. This is an innovation project proposed at CITT, which my team and I developed as our final thesis. Under my leadership, we successfully developed the project in a smooth and organized manner using the Waterfall Methodology. It became the highest-rated thesis project of the 2024 Computer Science generation. Additionally, we won first place in the "Social Impact" category and second place in the "Project of the Year" category at Demoday 2024.
activities: Reviewing and approving the project's code and documentation
First place in the "Social Impact" category at Demoday 2024
Second place in the "Project of the Year" category at Demoday 2024.
